name: Misplaced (Abel Rodríguez)
description:
Something has thrown your world’s integrity out the window and nothing is as it should be. To fix this, you must restore the elements of your world to their rightful place.

Controls

  • WASD - Player movement
  • Left Click - Pick up / place material
  • E - Interact with triggerable material. (Green materials)
  • Mouse movement - Move camera.

Video game developed by:

  • Ian Misael Talamantes Castrejón
  • Abel Edwin Rodríguez Chavira
  • Ángel Osvaldo López Carrillo
  • Omar Salinas Villanueva

We hope you enjoy our game! It was made with a lot of love in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020's Game Jam.

Unfortunately, it has a few issues, such as the mouse sensitivity being too high and the last level is broken, but we hope it doesn't impact too much on your experience of the game.
